content:
When the section 4.1.6 Bulk Data IG says:

Producer systems SHALL support Patient, Related Person, Practitioner, PractitionerRole, Location, Organization, Coverage, Group resource types for the [base]/Group/[id]/$export?_type parameter.

does it mean extracting Patient and all related/referenced resources as per the ATR data model, or any combination of the listed resources, e.g., PractitionerRole, Organization and Location only?
@Nagesh Bashyam, could you please help address Shamil's question above?

Shamil
The resources listed are all mandatory because they are required to construct the ATR data model on the provider side. So servers are expected to support all of these resources.

Hi Nagesh, the FHIR server supporting all resources and resources required for a single query are different things.
For example, is this request valid from the ATR point of view:
GET [base]/Group/[id]/$export&_type=Group,Organization
or should it always include the Patient as the pivot point that connects all other resources?

The intention was to include all the resources specified in the SHALL requirement (not just one or two). We can maybe clarify this further in the requirement if needed, can you open up a tracker for the issue to clarify.
Shamil, I see you logged the tracker under "DaVinci Project". Are you able to move this tracker to "FHIR Specifications Feedback" project and then specification: Da Vinci ATR?
